tag_list: marketing, online, business, seo, social-media, social-networking, public-relations, pr, advertising
overview:
• Recognized marcom professional with over 20 years of experience developing and leading online and offline marketing communications campaigns.
  • Respected leader of creative teams, web site developers and brand evangelists. Conceptualize and orchestrate marketing campaigns that effectively reinforce and build brand images.
  • Expert in the technical, conceptual and content development of sales-driving messaging and channel development. Proven ability to successfully promote mature products and accomplish successful product launches.

“Build trust with your customers and they will build your business.”

Specialties Marketing, PR, branding, strategic partnership development, reseller & affiliate channel development, search engine optimization (SEO), search engine marketing (SEM), and taking advantage of social media channels.
